code: import axios from"axios";import{GET_TESTIMONIAL}from"./action_type";export var getTestimonial=function getTestimonial(){return function(dispatch){return axios.get("http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/testimonial/lists").then(function(res){dispatch({type:GET_TESTIMONIAL,payload:res.data});});};};export function activateTestimonial(testi_id){return function(dispatch){return axios.get("http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/testimonial/active/"+testi_id).then(function(res){dispatch({type:GET_TESTIMONIAL,payload:res.data});});};}export function inactivateTestimonial(testi_id){return function(dispatch){return axios.get("http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/testimonial/inactive/"+testi_id).then(function(res){dispatch({type:GET_TESTIMONIAL,payload:res.data});});};}
